name: part_015
file: tmp_【#宝鐘マリン生誕祭2021】3DLIVE⧸ゲスト大勢！重大告知もりもり！【ホロライブ】 [dVlNi7Pby0w]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_015.mov

scenes.description: Okayu, Suisei, Rushia, Towa, and Marine perform 'Shura no Niwa' (based on 'Memeshikute') on stage.
Transition and intro for Houshou Marine's solo performance.
Houshou Marine performs her original song 'Ahoy!! 我ら宝鐘海賊団☆' on stage.

subtitles.original: 今日の驚きを忘れよう
subtitles.english: Let's forget today's surprises

subtitles.original: 昨日の震えない闇など
subtitles.english: Like the darkness of yesterday that didn't tremble

subtitles.original: 君は誰を継ぎ　誰と心を汲み交わす
subtitles.english: Who will you succeed, and with whom will you exchange your heart?

subtitles.original: 本当は抱き合って眠りたい
subtitles.english: Actually, I want to fall asleep in your arms

subtitles.original: カラカラに乾いた心を
subtitles.english: This bone-dry heart...

subtitles.original: 君の美しさで潤わして
subtitles.english: ...moisten it with your beauty

subtitles.original: 恋に焦がれ　いつもミスをした
subtitles.english: Longing for love, I always made mistakes

subtitles.original: 女の子心　雲のよう
subtitles.english: A girl's heart is like a cloud

subtitles.original: 惚れた腫れた　狭い心が　また乱れている
subtitles.english: In love and infatuated, my narrow heart is in disarray again

subtitles.original: 女（めめしく）
subtitles.english: Jealousy...

subtitles.original: 女々しくて　女々しくて　誰を見つめ
subtitles.english: Effeminate, effeminate, who are you looking at?

subtitles.original: 女々しくて　女々しくて　君が笑顔で
subtitles.english: Effeminate, effeminate, with your smile...

subtitles.original: 女々しくて　女々しくて　不条理なリフレインに
subtitles.english: Effeminate, effeminate, in this absurd refrain...

subtitles.original: 胸はもう
subtitles.english: ...my heart is already...

subtitles.original: 女々しくて　女々しくて　辛いよ
subtitles.english: Effeminate, effeminate, it's painful

subtitles.original: 俺という星に落としてやるさ
subtitles.english: I'll drop you onto the star that is me.

subtitles.original: 美しい花には棘があるんだよ
subtitles.english: Beautiful flowers have thorns.

subtitles.original: おはよう　かわいいね　〇しちゃうよ
subtitles.english: Good morning. You're cute. I'll ○ you.

subtitles.original: 全然言葉が思いつかない
subtitles.english: I can't think of any words at all.

subtitles.original: お仕置きが足りなかったかな
subtitles.english: Was the punishment not enough?

subtitles.original: そんなに潤んだ瞳で見ても　認知してあげない
subtitles.english: Even if you look at me with such teary eyes, I won't recognize you.

subtitles.original: 愛情という名の罠で君が欲しい
subtitles.english: I want you in a trap called love

subtitles.original: 僕の心　射抜くのよ
subtitles.english: Pierce through my heart

subtitles.original: 騙されたって　どうぞ構わない
subtitles.english: Even if I'm deceived, I don't mind

subtitles.original: 君といれるなら
subtitles.english: If I can be with you

subtitles.original: 愛されたいね　きっと見過ごした
subtitles.english: I want to be loved, I surely overlooked...

subtitles.original: 君のシグナル　もう一度
subtitles.english: ...your signal, once more

subtitles.original: 気まぐれかな　でも構わない
subtitles.english: Is it a whim? But I don't mind

subtitles.original: 君といたいから
subtitles.english: Because I want to be with you

subtitles.original: 女々しくて　女々しくて　光を浴びて
subtitles.english: Effeminate, effeminate, bathed in light

subtitles.original: 女々しくて　女々しくて　恋の歌歌って
subtitles.english: Effeminate, effeminate, singing a love song

subtitles.original: 女々しくて　女々しくて　いざ辿り着いたこの世界はもう
subtitles.english: Effeminate, effeminate, this world I've finally reached is already...

subtitles.original: 女々しくて　女々しくて　辛いよ
subtitles.english: Effeminate, effeminate, it's painful

subtitles.original: 海賊なら　Yo-Ho! 踊れ　叫べ　Yo-Ho!
subtitles.english: If you're a pirate, Yo-Ho! Dance, scream, Yo-Ho!

subtitles.original: さあ　今　旗のもとへ
subtitles.english: Now, come under the flag

subtitles.original: 宝鐘海賊団
subtitles.english: The Houshou Pirates

subtitles.original: 出航！ (Ahoy! Ahoy! Ahoy!)
subtitles.english: Set sail! (Ahoy! Ahoy! Ahoy!)

subtitles.original: 踊るアホイに見るアホイ　全速前進だ！
subtitles.english: Dancing ahoy, watching ahoy, full speed ahead!

subtitles.original: 進め！太陽燦々　大航海日和だ
subtitles.english: Advance! The sun is shining, it's a great day for a voyage

subtitles.original: 歌え！最高のテンション　波の音に乗せ　ドンブラコ
subtitles.english: Sing! Highest tension, riding the sound of the waves, donburako

subtitles.original: 海でガールズパーティー　お陰様でハッピー
subtitles.english: Girls' party at sea, thanks to you, I'm happy

subtitles.original: お空は毒々　キラキラ
subtitles.english: The sky is poisonous and sparkling

subtitles.original: 山奥ボロボロマイハウスで　夢を見て
subtitles.english: Dreaming in my worn-out house deep in the mountains

subtitles.original: あ、神様！　いつかこのマリンを　本物の海賊にしてください！
subtitles.english: Oh, God! Please make this Marine a real pirate someday!

subtitles.original: 声を上げて　さあ出航だ　我ら宝鐘海賊団
subtitles.english: Raise your voice, now let's set sail, we are the Houshou Pirates

subtitles.original: コンパス片手に旗を掲げ　この海をジャックしちゃおう
subtitles.english: With a compass in one hand and raising the flag, let's jack this sea

subtitles.original: ヨソロついておいで　共にYo-Ho Yo-Ho叫ぼう
subtitles.english: Follow along, steady as she goes, let's scream Yo-Ho Yo-Ho together

subtitles.original: ああ　最高の日々
subtitles.english: Ah, the best days

subtitles.original: ようこそ我が船へ
subtitles.english: Welcome to my ship

subtitles.original: (Ahoy! Ahoy! Ahoy! Ahoy!) 踊るアホイに見るアホイ
subtitles.english: (Ahoy! Ahoy! Ahoy! Ahoy!) Dancing ahoy, watching ahoy

subtitles.original: 1, 2, サンバ！サンバ！
subtitles.english: 1, 2, Samba! Samba!

subtitles.original: 熱く語ろうパッション　思いを解き放て
subtitles.english: Let's talk passionately, release your thoughts

subtitles.original: 赤くひらめくファッション　形から入るタイプです
subtitles.english: Crimson flickering fashion, I'm the type who starts with appearance

subtitles.original: 発射10秒前　走れ！ガチ恋列車
subtitles.english: 10 seconds before launch, run! Serious-love train

subtitles.original: 夕焼けも照れるわ　ギラギラ
subtitles.english: Even the sunset is shy, dazzling

subtitles.original: じんわり汗も滴るいい女…　だけど！
subtitles.english: A fine woman dripping with sweat... but!

subtitles.original: あ、神様！　船長はセンシティブだと　BANされちゃうのですね！？　はにゃー！
subtitles.english: Oh, God! If the Captain is sensitive, she'll get banned, right!? Hanyaa!
